stimulusHtml: Which of the following is the most likely result from clearing mature, forested land and converting it into agricultural land that would be used for cattle grazing?
choicesHtml: There will be a decrease in the amount of runoff into nearby streams.
There will be a reduction in the emission of greenhouse gases released into the atmosphere.
There will be an increase in the diversity and size of primary producers.
There will be a reduction in the uptake of atmospheric carbon dioxide.
